sen.e: This trouble was a perpetration because of accumulated hard feeling from the fact that Tadatsugu, father of Kakutaro, was an elder brother of Tadayuki and bother of them were children born out of wedlock, but, because of his poor health, he was not allowed to take over as head of the family and he died of illness; they were reduced to powerty and the youger brother was not raised to the peerage and went to war in Taiwan as a private soldier and died in war.
